# Yorkshire Pudding

\begin{recipe}{Yorkshire Pudding}{4}{1\fr12 hours}
\freeform This recipe was taken from the \texttt{cuisine} package of Ben Cohen.

\ingredient[\fr12]{pt}{milk}
\ingredient[2]{oz}{butter}
\ingredient[5]{oz}{self-raising flour}

Heat the milk and butter until nearly boiling. Add flour and allow to seeth over.

\ingredients[3]{}{eggs}
\ingredients{to taste}{salt and pepper}

Add the remaining eggs and whisk again. Cooks at 220\0C for about 1 hour.

\freeform Eat with a spoon.
\end{recipe}
